resources.string: You can find the backup in the \"Delta Chat\" folder using the \"Files\" app.\n\nMove the backup out of this folder to keep it when deleting Delta Chat.
In the system settings, enable \"Privacy/Location Services\" and set \"Delta Chat/Location\" to \"Always\" and \"Precise\".
In-Chat Utilities or Games will be shown here
Shows the most recent In-Chat Utilities and Games
In-Chat Utilities or Games will be shown here
